name: Merged Repo
subtitle: Combined AltStore Repo
description: This repo combines multiple AltStore-compatible sources.

apps.name: Enmity
apps.developerName: CyPwn IPA Library / Enmity Team / zxcvbn's tweaked IPAs
apps.localizedDescription:
Discord, injected with the popular tweak Enmity!
Last updated: 08-11-2024
Status: ✅

apps.name: EeveeSpotify
apps.localizedDescription:
As the successor of the original and now outdated Spotilife tweak, EeveeSpotify emerges as the first and only tweak (for now) with significant potential for accessing Spotify Premium. Note: To fix widgets, install Spotify from the App Store then proceed to force install Eevee over Spotify. Please refrain from opening issues here.
Last updated: 08-10-2024
Status: ✅ ⭐ 👍

apps.name: iTorrent
apps.localizedDescription:
Probably the best Torrent client for iOS 9.3 and up.
Last updated: 07-30-2024
Status: ✅ 👍 ⭐

apps.name: TrollFools
apps.localizedDescription:
Experimental app for injecting tweaks into App Store apps.
Last updated: 07-28-2024
Status: ✅ 👍

apps.name: Watusi3
apps.developerName: CyPwn IPA Library / DPixel / MeemNon / zxcvbn’s tweaked IPAs / FouadRaheb
apps.localizedDescription:
WhatsApp, injected with Watusi v1.2.36, Stalky v4.1.27, OnlineNotify v3.4.4. Notifications and iCloud backups work with TrollStore.
Last updated: 07-03-2024
Status: ✅

apps.name: Procreate
apps.localizedDescription:
Removed from the repo: Grab futur updates here.

Status: ❌

Status: ✅

apps.name: Helium
apps.localizedDescription:
Status Bar Widgets for TrollStore, compatible with iOS >=14 and Jailbroken devices as well. Users on iOS >=16 must enable developer mode.

Status: ✅

apps.name: iPoGo
apps.localizedDescription:
Pokemon GO with a bunch of cheats, including joystick-to-walk, increased catch accuracy, sniping, teleporting, etc. USE RESPONSIBLY, OVERUSE CAN GET YOU BANNED.
Last updated: 08-15-2024
Status: ✅

apps.name: TrollBox
apps.localizedDescription:
A bunch of TrollStore tools packed into one application. Tools include AirTroller, carrier changer, location simulation, passcode buttons theming, device (un)supervised spoof, etc. This is still in alpha, so expect bugs if you try it
Last updated: 11-29-2023
Status: ❌

apps.name: TrollSpeed
apps.localizedDescription:
Displays upload and download speeds beneath the status bar. Work on all iOS versions compatible with TrollStore. Note: on iOS 16 and above, "Developer Mode" needs to be activated.
Last updated: 06-21-2024
Status: ✅

apps.name: SCMusicPlus
apps.localizedDescription:
Improve your SoundCloud experience by eliminating advertisements, getting rid of promoted playlists, and removing upsell buttons. Installation: Download the standard SoundCloud app from the app store and sign in, then delete the app while still logged in, and use this IPA. Once installed, you can start enjoying it as you should already be logged in.
Last updated: 12-12-2023
Status: ✅

apps.name: onesecpro
apps.localizedDescription:
App that helps you taking a deep breath before accessing selected websites or apps (like Twitter, YouTube, Instagram), disrupting immediate social media habits and introducing a deliberate pause to reduce usage over time. A user requested it so here it is.
Last updated: 07-18-2024
Status: ✅

apps.name: VSCOLion
apps.localizedDescription:
VSCO, injected with the tweak Lion by Michael Lema. Allows for saving pretty much all media by long-pressing on them. Few things to note: If you're jailbroken, fully disable tweak injection into VSCO using Choicy. Signing in through Apple and Google don't work (clicking Apple does nothing, clicking Google causes a crash). If you need to sign in this way, create a backup of VSCO from the App Store using either Apps Manager or Crane, depending on if your phone is jailbroken or not, while signed in before installing this ipa through TrollStore. This version also does not include dark mode. All other features should be the same
Last updated: 12-03-2022
Status: ⚠️

Kodi (formerly XBMC) is a free and open source media player application developed by the XBMC/Kodi Foundation, a non-profit technology consortium. Kodi is available for multiple operating-systems and hardware platforms, featuring a 10-foot user interface for use with televisions and remote controls. It allows users to play and view most videos, music, podcasts, and other digital media files from local and network storage media and the internet.

This app takes inspiration from MacOS version designed to avoid overcharging iPhones/iPads over extended periods, which can harm the battery. It allows users to set maximum and minimum charging capacities and a maximum temperature threshold for charging. Once configured, the daemon continuously monitors the battery's capacity.
Last updated: 07-06-2024
Status: ✅

apps.name: CattleGrid
apps.localizedDescription:
Allows you to create your own amiibo utilizing ntag215 on an jailbroken or TrollStore device. Note: After you've installed the app, you need to manually locate the tag bin files and place them in the /var/mobile/Documents/CattleGrid/ directory.
Last updated: 12-26-2023
Status: ✅

apps.name: CarrotWeatherUltra
apps.localizedDescription:
This might be the best iPhone weather app, offering real-time, hourly, and 7-day forecasts with a touch of sarcastic humor to brighten any forecast. HIGHLY customizable for a personalized weather experience. Note: To ensure the widgets function properly, you MUST activate your location services; otherwise, you'll encounter a "Network Error."
Last updated: 07-23-2024
Status: ✅ 👍 ⭐

apps.name: CarPlex
apps.localizedDescription:
An app that allows you to use Plex content from CarPlay system.
Last updated: 03-03-2024
Status: ✅

apps.name: CarMovie
apps.localizedDescription:
Enables users to play their preferred videos through CarPlay. A demo illustrating video customization is accessible, with forthcoming features encompassing folder-based video management. Supports iOS14/15/16 and 17. Note: Not all versions of iOS16/17 are supported).

Status: ✅

Audiomack is a worldwide music streaming and discovery application that enables you to download and access the latest songs, albums, mixtapes, and playlists offline. Enjoy entire tracks without the need for data, as well as local MP3 files. Note: Very laggy.

Cracked by CBZ. Provides extensive customization options similar to its jailbroken version, including toggling the recorder, biometric authentication, sync settings, server management, backups, cloud linking, notification customization, and sound settings, all while requiring legal compliance and consent for recording in many areas.

Status: ✅

apps.localizedDescription:
Offers the most precise prayer times along with a range of other features including the Quran, Tasbeeh, Islamic Calendar, a compass for Qiblah direction, and Ramadan 2024. Note: Tweak is unstable, restart your device if pro features are still locked (refer to #616)

apps.name: AsTools
apps.localizedDescription:
I can only verify that this works with TrollStore. Also, the entire app is in Chinese. Chinese app store, lets you download and install apps such as Douyin (Chinese TikTok), as if they were from the App Store. No certificates, no Apple ID, none of that. It just installs, and it works

apps.name: AddonsPro
apps.localizedDescription:
Robust Safari browser extension that offers a variety of features, including support for Tampermonkey scripts, ad blocking, intelligent search, and much more. A user requested it so here it is. Note: Install the TrollStore version, activate the Pro version and then re-install the app from the App Store over it. + app seems to gathers a lot of data.. Consider this before deciding to use it.
Last updated: 07-11-2024
Status: ✅

apps.name: AdGuardPro
apps.localizedDescription:
An extremely effective ad blocker for Safari. It not only eliminates annoying ads but also enhances your privacy with advanced tracking protection. AdGuard for iOS is an open-source app that is completely transparent and safe to use. Note: DNS protection is effective but it may cause conflicts with other services in use. Despite this, I HIGHLY recommend EVERYONE to use it as its usefulness is unmatched. (To block telemetry for example, such as ESign.)
Last updated: 07-03-2024
Status: ✅ 👍

IPTV streamer that also supports IPv6 to access to China mainland channels. Setup with URLs from GitHub. A user requested it so here it is.

apps.localizedDescription:
Introducing yet another "ChatGPT-4" assistant, which holds promise for intriguing features. However, it is likely that its performance might fall short of Chat Genie (App above). Further testing is warranted to determine its efficacy accurately.

apps.name: Unc0ver
apps.subtitle: The most advanced jailbreak tool
apps.versionDescription: Add exploit guidance to improve reliability on A12-A13 iPhones running iOS 14.6-14.8
apps.localizedDescription:
The most advanced jailbreak tool for iOS 11.0 to iOS 14.3

Stable: Utilizing proper and deterministic techniques, jail​break stability is guaranteed.
Secure: Utilizing native system sandbox exceptions, security remains intact while enabling access to jailbreak files.
Extensively Tested: Unc0ver has been extensively tested to ensure it's a seamless experience on all devices.

Jailbreak for all devices, from iOS 12.2 to 12.5.1

Note: Only Nonce setter available on 12.1.2 - 12.3 and 12.4 on A12
Note: 12.1.3 - 12.5.1 only supported on A7 - A11 devices. All devices supported on 12.0 - 12.1.2
On iOS 12 to 12.1.2? Download the IPA from https://chimera.sh instead! (why are you on such an old ios tho)
apps.name: Chimera
apps.subtitle: Your device, your way.
apps.versionDescription:
* Adds full support for iOS 12.5.5
* Updates Sileo to 2.2.3
* Removes fancy animation background on iPhone 5S / 6, iPad Air 1, iPod touch 6 and iPad mini 2 / 3 to use a more basic background in order to improve exploit success rate

apps.localizedDescription: Rewound turns your smartphone into your favourite MP3 player from the early 2000s. Access your whole Apple Music library with the swipe of a clickywheel.

apps.subtitle: iPod Classic for iPhone
apps.versionDescription: Rewound has been pulled from AppStore. Further updates are unlikely.

apps.name: YouTube Reborn
apps.subtitle: Ad blocking, video downloading, and more!
apps.versionDescription: Updated YouTube base to v16.19.6 and updated YouTube Reborn

apps.localizedDescription:
RetroArch is a frontend for emulators, game engines and media players.

It enables you to run classic games on a wide range of computers and consoles through its slick graphical interface. Settings are also unified so configuration is done once and for all.

In addition to this, you will soon be able to run original game discs (CDs) from RetroArch.

RetroArch has advanced features like shaders, netplay, rewinding, next-frame response times, runahead, machine translation, blind accessibility features, and more!
apps.name: RetroArch
apps.subtitle: All-in-One emulator for iOS.
apps.versionDescription: Updated RetroArch to 1.10.1. View the changelog here: https://www.libretro.com/index.php/retroarch-1-10-1-release/

apps.localizedDescription:
Play your PSP games in HD!
PPSSPP can run your PSP games on your PC in full HD resolution, and play them on Android too. It can even upscale textures that would otherwise be too blurry as they were made for the small screen of the original PSP.

Even on modern Android phones and tablets, you can often run at double the original resolution.

Enhance your experience!
Play in HD resolutions and more
Play on a tablet for big-screen mobile gaming
Customize on-screen touch controls or use an external controller or keyboard
Save and restore game state anywhere, anytime
Crank up the anisotropic filtering and texture scaling
Continue where you left off by transferring saves from your real PSP
Free & Open Source
PPSSPP is an open source project, licensed under the GPL 2.0 (or later). Anyone is welcome to contribute improvements to the code. Partly thanks to such contributions, PPSSPP's compatibility is steadily increasing, letting us all play our PSP games on the devices of our choice.
apps.name: PPSSPP Stable
apps.subtitle: PSP emulator for iOS
apps.versionDescription: Updated to 1.12.3. Includes lots of bugfixes and improvements.
